CustomField.description: Used to provide the name of another individual who has health insurance coverage that may coordinate with the patient's primary insurance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The “Other Insured’s Name” indicates that there is a holder of another policy that maycover the patient.Use commas to separate the last name, first name, and middle initial. A hyphen can be used for hyphenated names. Do not use periods within the name.
CustomField.label: Other Insured's Name
